# dbcti-paper

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains the code for the dbcti-paper.

## Data structure
* `datasets` file contains simulated data included in the paper. Real datasets are too large to be included and are available at the corresponding GEO datasets. 
* `simulation_and_real_data` file contains codes for different tools constructing cell trajectories
* `evaluation` file contains codes for evaluating performances of tools
* `case_study` file contains codes for performing case study
